param.name: method
param.description: The HTTP method/verb for which to examine each property for exclusion.

param.name: excluded
param.description: A reference array used to store the excluded properties for later use.

param.name: exceptions
param.description: An optional array of exceptions to be included even without the proper annotations.

return.description: Returns the newly minimalized RestObject, which has any non-required fields set to null.
